comment: It s clearly off LeBron . He touched it last . That s not the point of this . If I held a ball out in front of me and you swipe down and hit it straight out of bounds , frame by frame , it may graze my pinky finger last . But who is it really out on ? That s my point . It s common sense .

comment: You know how players try to avoid touching the ball after it gets hit by a defender on the way out of bounds ? Yeah , if it hits your pinky finger it's out on you . That's common sense . You're trying to make an exception to a clear rule that is utterly unnecessary .
